titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Club of the Central Valley (Calif.) Records
Yale Club of the Central Valley (Calif.) Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:43

did.unittitle: Yale Club of the Central Valley (Calif.) records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, newsletters, memoranda, photographs, and other records documenting the activities of the Yale Club of the Central Valley.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale Club of the Central Valley (Calif.)

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 8-C-2 (YRG 8-C-2), Records of Yale regional alumni organizations.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Club of the Central Valley (Calif.) Records (RU 1060). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, newsletters, memoranda, photographs, and other records documenting the activities of the Yale Club of the Central Valley.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges -- Alumni and alumnae
controlaccess.corpname: Yale Club of the Central Valley (Calif.)
Yale University -- Alumnae and alumnae -- Societies, etc.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The accession consists of a Certificate of Recognition presented to the Yale Club of the Central Valley of California for its participation in a tree planting as part of a Yale Service Day project.
